column5: Was spending some time in florida over the past few weeks.  Got out on a couple charters, The first one is out of ft. lauderdale  Only me and the missus on the boat not a bad day for a few hours fishing all fish were caught in hour and a half.  Some action shots.   For their size those dolphins fight hard even on the ovesized tackle.  Caught a few small tuna and a spanish mackrel as well but heres some photos of the catch.   After that the wife and I went on a cruise in the carribean and got on a reef fishing charter out of st Maarten.  Ihad brought along my 5 piece travel rod equiped with 8 lb. test and figured id give it a whirl.  Fish on right away and off just as quick 8 lb. test 100 ft down on a reef dosn't hold up to well on a medim action rod did get this little jack in on the light setup.   Heres a bucha reef fish shots.................. The wife with an emperor triggerfish  Her again with a strawberry grouper  Me with a mutton snapper  Her with another grouper  And me with this ugly little fella we caught a ton of fish out there these are just a few we had a great time.  As for the best catch of the trip im not sure if it was this huge great white  Or the lovely girl i can now call my wife.....
Wow.  That looks pretty awesome.  Not too many reports end with someone getting married.  Congrats.

WOW..first of all congrats to you both !!!!.  ..now thats what i call a great holiday/fishing trip/wedding !!!.  .sure was quite a selection of different fish from the reef,looks like it was a ton of fun !!!.  ..thanks for sharing...cheers
Oh man, this report got me sooooo pumped!!  I'm headed to cuba on friday morning!!!! Yee haw!!!  Thanks for posting this, and a big congrats on tying the knot!!!!  Sinker

WTG on the "hooking up" Looks like a fantastic trip. Your a lucky man to find a lady who is willing to go fishing for a honeymoon. She's a keeper for sure. You can only top this if you make it custom to travel to a different fishing destination to celebrate each anniversary, now that would be cool. Great post and again congrats to you both.  Is there anyone out there that can PhotoShop a Leafs hat on this guy? Great photos tarnished by a Detroit cap. What a shame.

That report got me so pumped I'M gonna get married too!!!  lol  Ok, seriously.  That is quite the surpise ending to your fishng report lickmyarmpit!  Congratulatons to you and to Mrs. lickmyarmpit.  It looks like the two of you are off on a fishing trip that will last a lifetime!  Congratulations!
Best of luck to you and your new Mrs.  Looks like you had  a blast down South.
I think the best catch of your life is on the last pict  Congrats!!!! ohh and nice fish
Very nice report, beautiful pics & congrats on the wedding
Thanks for all the well wishes fellas, looks like i came home just in time for some steel.....tight lines.
Congrats lickypits!!!!  Looks like you had a great time.  Good to see that your wife is very sporting.  Good job!
